title: Fallen Leaves Recipe
full_text:
Fallen Leaves Recipe

Ingredients
3/4
ounce
Calvados or other
apple brandy
3/4
ounce
sweet vermouth
1/4
ounce
dry vermouth
1
dash
brandy
Directions
Pour ingredients into a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir briskly for 30 seconds; strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a large piece of lemon peel over the drink, and use the twist as garnish.
